name: Light's Out
description:
You're not alone. Don't let the lights go out.

Made in less than 4 days for the Summer Slow Jams August 2020: Horror Games. Theme: "Don't Let It Out".

This is a 3D survival horror game where you find yourself in a house with strange activities going on around you. Lights randomly go out and bad things will happen to you if don't turn them back on.

***Recommended to play in the dark with headphones for a nice immersive experience.***

If you liked or enjoyed our game, please leave a rating and tell us your feedback!

Follow us on Twitter @JNSquared for news, updates, and future game announcements!

This game is completely free to download and enjoy, but any donations would be appreciated. We will use 100% of the donations towards the development of future games!
